snippet: At least two people suspected of being militants and one soldier were killed near the disputed border with Pakistan, an Indian Army official said.

byline.original: By SAMEER YASIR and NIDA NAJAR
byline.contributor: Sameer Yasir reported from Baramulla, and Nida Najar from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: At least two people suspected of being militants and one soldier were killed near the disputed border with Pakistan, an Indian Army official said.

headline.main: Militants and Soldier Are Killed in Kashmir Gun Battle, Indian Official Says
headline.print_headline: Militants and Soldier Are Killed in Kashmir Gun Battle, Indian Officials Say
